dict.string: Bluetooth permission required for Diagnosing the bluetooth hardware.
Calendar permission required for showing date
Contacts permission required for fetch contacts
The Camera is required to scan QR codes and To complete the Camera test.
To Check if the FaceId sensors are really working by authenticating using FaceId
This app requires access to your location when the screen is on and the app is displayed to complete the GPS Test

This app requires access to your location when the screen is on and the app is displayed to complete the GPS Test
Microphone permission required to complete the Mic and Speaker test
Photo library access required to complete the camera test
Photo library access required to save a picture clicked by you to complete the camera test
